ResourceFeature.Name: Rod of Resurrection
ResourceFeature.Text: The rod has 5 charges. While you hold it, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: heal (expends 1 charge) or resurrection (expends 5 charges). The rod regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. If the rod is reduced to 0 charges, roll a d20. On a 1, the rod disappears in a burst of radiance.

MagicProperty.Requirement: Rod, legendary (requires attunement by a cleric, druid, or paladin)
